attributes.action: withdraw plans to inspect childrens' school lunch boxes and confiscate food seen as unsuitable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government are proposing plans to inspect the school lunch boxes of children. Parents that include items such as chocolate bars will be sent a letter from the school advising them of what their children 'should' eat. Food may even be confiscated by the school if it is thought that the fat or sugar content is too high.
This has been done under the guise of preventing childhood obesity but is yet another example of 'The Nanny State'
It is the parent's responsibly to feed their child.
